name: Upgrade (Lucidus)
description:
You’re a really simple robot, who starts his life with… nothing. You have to explore the level to find all the needed controls. When you find them and collect all the batteries, you will manage to open The Mysterious Gate… What will you find there?

Controls (you will have a tutorial in the game)

  • T to TELEPORT - remember this one when you finally install it :)
  • arrows to walk (when you install them)
  • space to jump (when you install it)
  • all arrows to fly (when you find jetpack)
  • all arrows (or space) to swim (when you install it)
  • left/right arrow and up arrow to wall walk (when you install it)

Devlog:

- fixed shock animation to play after you jump on lasers

- jumping on ground from higher parts in safe now (especially for us, developers...)

- fixed sound effects
